entries.title: Using KMM-ViewModel library to share VM between iOS and Android
entries.description: A frequent question when using KMM (Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile) is firstly whether to share the view model between the iOS and Android clients and, if doing so, how best to do it in a way that still stays true to each platform’s approach to lifecycle, concurrency and observability.
